data.title: 5 Top Things to do in Nuku Hiva – CruiseBooking.com
data.meta_description: Unsure of what to include in your to-do list while visiting Nuku Hiva in French Polynesia? Here are the top 5 things to do in Nuku Hiva to make your visit memorable.
data.text:
Book Your Dream Cruise

Situated in French Polynesia in the Central South Pacific Ocean, Nuku Hiva has a rich heritage of natural, cultural, and archaeological treasures. From Hakatea Bay’s scenic beauty to Tekao’s magnificent panoramic view, you will be in a constant state of awe.

The population of this island is just under 3000 people. This makes it one of the most remote locations on this planet you can go to for an enjoyable holiday.

While strolling through the dense forests, you will encounter mystifying archaeological remains. It also is home to sacred statues, open-air community spaces, and traditions of cultural practices like sculpting and tattooing. This blog will discuss the top 5 things to do in Nuku Hiva that will leave an everlasting impression on your life.

Key things to do in Nuku Hiva

The following are some of the most fun activities you can partake in Nuku Hiva:

1. Visit the craft markets

There are several craft markets for you to pay a visit. Just by the tourist office, you will find a craft center offering carved necklaces, bracelets, and fragrant oils that you can get for your friends and families.

Damas Taupotini, a master carver, has a shop just across the road from Pae Pae Piki Vehine, where you will find his carvings on stone, bone, and wood.

For gifts and souvenirs you can visit Boutique du Centre Plongée Marquises to buy shell necklaces, urios and pareu (sarongs).

2. Ride the waves at Anaho Bay

Located two kilometers east of Hatiheu, Anaho Bay provides you with a surreal beach experience. You can walk or take a boat to reach its mesmerizing white sand beaches.

The bay is surrounded by lush green hillsides. One can spot colorful corals, turtles, or reef sharks while snorkeling along the shore. Taking a quick swim in the beautiful Anaho Bay is one of the key things to do in Nuku Hiva. Within the entire island, besides Hatiheu, Anaho is the only place you can go for a horse riding experience.

3. Dip your soul in Taipivai Valley

The Taipivai Valley will leave you feeling grounded and calm. This green valley is the home to the enigmatic site of Puake.

Walking through this stunning archaeological site, you will come across many 'tikis,' which are basically wooden or stone sculptures of half-human or half-god ancestors.

These sculptures are about 1.70 meters in height and are prominent pieces of history scattered throughout the island. Taipivai also has several breathtaking waterfalls that aid in its ambiance of being nothing short of a paradise.

4. Explore the archaeological sites

Tohua Koueva is a communal site that resides just over 1.3 kilometers up the Pakiu Valley on the Taipivai road. It is believed that this area belonged to Chief Pakoko, who was martyred by the French in 1845.

Upon visiting this archaeological site, you will find picturesque scenery. The view consists of huge banyan trees and beautiful flowers growing everywhere. It gives off an ambiance of utter peace and tranquility. This exceptional sight will make you wish to revisit this place.

You will also get a glimpse of tiki statues, petroglyphs, and a human sacrifice stone. Some tour guides might even demonstrate the ritual of the sacrifices.

Key takeaways

If you're still struggling to comprehend an itinerary, pick the options you know will be the most adventurous or absolutely soul-cleansing for you. You can also consult with the locals to have a better understanding. Now that you have gone through this piece and garnered all the information regarding the top 5 things to do in Nuku Hiva, the next step would be to book tickets.

For that purpose, you can visit CruiseBooking.com to book a cruise around the island for a heavenly experience.

Other than these five, there are several options to add to your things to do on the Nuku Hiva list. So, make sure you conduct a thorough scan of all the available options, and don't forget to have a great time while you are there!
